CustomField.description: The API name for the record is too short; use the pattern "trigger_fieldOnCalcItem_to_rollupFieldOnTarget_rollup" - for example: 'trigger_opportunity_stagename_to_account_name_rollup' (use lowercase on the field names). If there is a matching Rollup Control record, those rules will be used. If you are using the "batch" method in Rollup, use this pattern instead: "trigger_batch_objectName_rollup", for example: "trigger_batch_opportunity_rollup" to set controls for the whole thing. Individual Rollup Control records override the settings for the batch they happen to be in, with the exception of the override flag for "Should Abort Run", which always cancels the whole thing.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The API name for the record is too short; use the pattern "trigger_fieldOnCalcItem_to_rollupFieldOnTarget_rollup" - for example: 'trigger_opportunity_stagename_to_account_name_rollup' (use lowercase on the field names). If there is a matching Rollup Control record, those rules will be used. If you are using the "batch" method in Rollup, use this pattern instead: "trigger_batch_objectName_rollup", See field description for more.
CustomField.label: Trigger Or Invocable Name
